text: vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho do BOHA prostrates kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli, ta sontsi, ta misyatsi, ta zirkakh, ta horakh, ta derevakh, ta tvarynakh, ta bahato lyudey? Bahato inshykh sered lyudey zdiysnyuyutʹsya shchob pryrikty. Whomever sorom BOHA, nikhto ne vshanuyutʹ yoho. Vse ye z·hidno z BOZHYM bude
